text: @GavinNewsom @GavinNewsom Please be sure you have current models and that you get input from docs on the front line - not just academic virus theorists.  The Dr. Erickson COVID 19 video is now "gone" off internet!  Kern County, CA docs!  COVID19 data compared to Flu - PLS listen.

entity.name: Frontline
entity.description: "Frontline" offers an unflinching and compelling look at complex, vital and often-controversial subjects. Each broadcast consists of a long-form news documentary. Topics run the gamut -- from Bernie Madoff's intricate fraud and prisoner abuse at Abu Ghraib, to AIDs, racial issues and Wal-Mart's effect on the U.S. economy.

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
